translate: 角色尝试使用外交技能提升同伴的精神状态

original: Success adds the Motivated Condition to all party-members
translate: 成功会给所有队伍成员添加激励状态

translate: 找到的食物需要等到下一次休息期才能食用

original: The character attempts to instruct the party using their Lore skill
translate: 角色尝试使用知识技能指导队伍

original: Success gives a small XP reward
translate: 成功给予少量经验奖励

original: The character has a chance to create a small number of Hunting Arrows depending on their Crafting skill
translate: 角色有一定几率根据其制作技能制作少量狩猎箭矢

original: Taking a running start, you leap

translate: 或许附近有开启机制，就在城市内部

original: This is one of the entrances to the inn

original: You manage to descend the wall

original: Press TAB to exit or ESC to clear console
translate: 按TAB键退出或按ESC键清除控制台

original: heals the party fully - adds 1000 gold. - Wins any combat
translate: 治愈整个队伍 - 增加1000金币 - 任何战斗胜利

original: This item cannot be used like this
This merchant will not buy stolen goods
This item is not for sale
Gold, equipped items and quest items cannot be traded
translate: 金币、装备物品和任务物品不能交易

original: This merchant no longer trusts you and refuses to trade
translate: 这位商人不再信任你，拒绝交易
商人负担不起这件物品
剩余金币 - 物品价值

original: Select a target for your Ability!
Select a target to use ability!
Select a target for your SPELL!
Select a target for your Maneuver!
Characters cannot hold actions once they have begun acting
translate: 角色一旦开始行动便无法再持有动作

original: was a year of little note for the Empire
translate: 对帝国来说，这一年没有什么值得一提的事情

original: The catastrophe was wholly natural albeit tragic
translate: 这场灾难虽然悲惨，但完全是自然原因

original: The volcano Kataban awoke after millennia of dormancy
translate: 千年沉睡的火山卡塔班苏醒了

original: It is written that the plume of smoke could be seen from the mainland
translate: 据记载，烟柱从大陆上也能看到

original: But there were other rumors as well
translate: 但也有一些其他的传言

original: Sailors claim they saw a new star in the sky the night of Karaban’s eruption
translate: 水手们声称在卡拉班爆发的夜晚看到了一颗新星

original: Such rumors are naught but lies
Let it be known that after much toil and hardship, {PLAYER} joins the illustrious ranks of the most holy order of the Persevering Blade
translate: 众所周知，在经历了无数辛劳和困苦后，{PLAYER}加入了坚忍之刃最神圣的行列

original: To be one of us is to have spat in the face of Death and Despair
translate: 成为我们中的一员，就是向死亡和绝望的挑战

original: It is to be one who forges ahead where lesser souls stand trembling
translate: 成为我们中的一员，就是向更弱小的灵魂所站立的颤抖之地迈进

original: You completed the game as a level {LEVEL?} {CLASS?} in {DAYS?} days
translate: 你以等级{VALUE}的{CLASS}完成了游戏，在{VALUE}天内

original: Report thine feat on Twitter to (a)SkaldRPG!
translate: 在推特上报告你的成就，@SkaldRPG！
